steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dq5re","text":"Dissolve lipid mixtures with chloroform in glass vials in moles percent as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehd1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egr80","text":"PS liposomes: 99.5% brain PS:0.5% Rhod-PE.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13br","text":"GC/PS nanotubes: 39.5% Galactosylceramide:60% brian PS:0.5% Cy5-PE.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fe8ef","text":"Evaporate chloroform under a stream of nitrogen gas to produce a lipid film on the glass surface.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jvfu","text":"Dry the lipid film in a vacuum oven for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"8E92D6A01F8611EDA2BB5D346001B749","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a8f7h","text":"Rehydrate the dried lipid films in liposome buffer at a final concentration of   (~ ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":79,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"A0C188301F8611EDA2BB5D346001B749","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1.2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"BB3736B01F8611EDA2BB5D346001B749","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqbga","text":"For PS mixtures, form the liposomes by three freeze (liquid N2)–thaw (  water bath) cycles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C477FCF01F8611EDA2BB5D346001B749","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7o1i1","text":"Remove large aggregates by a brief centrifugation (  for  ) and store in the dark at   to avoid photooxidation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"500","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D769B0601F8611EDA2BB5D346001B749","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"DB266A401F8611EDA2BB5D346001B749","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DE1A07C01F8611EDA2BB5D346001B749","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jagh","text":"For GC/PS mixtures, form the lipid nanotubes by a brief vortexing instead of freeze-thaw cycles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
